quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
author: Unknown

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Jerry Dunn

quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Anonymous

quote: Your fitness is 100% mental. Your body won’t go where your mind doesn’t push it.
author: Unknown

quote: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Anonymous

quote: It never gets easier. You just get stronger.
author: Unknown

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: What seems impossible today will one day become your warm-up.
author: Anonymous

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
author: Unknown

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t wish for a good body, work for it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
author: Khloe Kardashian

quote: Suffer the pain of discipline or suffer the pain of regret.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Be stronger than your strongest excuse.
author: Anonymous

quote: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
author: Gary Player

quote: A year from now, you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you still look good at the end of your workout, you didn’t work hard enough.
author: Unknown

quote: Your body can stand almost anything. It’s your mind that you have to convince.
author: Unknown

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Excuses don’t burn calories.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Fitness is like a relationship. You can’t cheat and expect it to work.
author: Unknown

quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: Strive for progress, not perfection.
author: Anonymous

quote: You are one workout away from a good mood.
author: Unknown

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
author: Fred Devito

quote: Take the risk or lose the chance.
author: Unknown

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar
